title: The Truth about Plastic Straws - Competitive Enterprise Institute
body: The Truth about Plastic Straws. President Trump's campaign has raised nearly half a million dollars in a matter of weeks selling plastic straws with "Trump" emblazed on each one. They fetch $15 for a package of 10 plastic straws, as the campaign markets them with the slogan: "Liberal paper straws don't work.". That's surely a high ...
